duties_responsibilities.duty: Review contract requirements and build the project execution roadmap for Windfarm Control System commissioning.
Collaborate with Engineering to retrieve required inputs and to support/attend lab testing.
Provide Method Statements, Work Instructions, and Test Procedures based on Customer requirements and GE product specifications.
Interface with Customer or any 3rd Parties to plan and prepare all site activities during different project phases for onshore and offshore locations.
Lead on-site commissioning during project execution at onshore and offshore locations until windfarm final acceptance.
Provide support either on site or remotely to field technicians and/or Customer.
Comply, implement, and enforce EHS policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering from an accredited College or University (Master's preferred)
